translations: [计] 巨型计算机，超级计算机

sentences.sentence: Sunway TaihuLight, took the top spot of the new list of the 500 most powerful supercomputers in the world.
sentences.translation: “神威·太湖之光”在世界超级计算机500强排行榜上登顶。

sentences.sentence: In short, supercomputers matter, a lot.
sentences.translation: 总之，超级计算机，用处很大。
